short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lightweight automatic Youtube Ad skip and also removes the annoying popup saying to disable your AdBlocker.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
YouTube Ad Skipper and Ad Block Warning remover. This will essentially skip adverts on videos when given the chance, so you can enjoy your content. 

PLUS this will also remove the adblock popup warning, which tells you to allow it under your adblocker, this should not be a thing and this extension will save you the hassle from having to close it!

I am to add more functionality to this in the future and will be a project I regularly work on as of when more annoying things can be avoided on YouTube.
